title: Game Scoop Episode 637
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing whether or not to watch game credits, Nintendo Switch's impressive milestone, Blaster Master Zero 3, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
